blocks.name: df-zeta
blocks.content: Define the Riemann zeta function. This definition uses a series expansion of the alternating zeta function ~~? zetaalt that is convergent everywhere except ` 1 ` , but going from the alternating zeta function to the regular zeta function requires dividing by ` 1 - 2 ^ ( 1 - s ) ` , which has zeroes other than ` 1 ` . To extract the correct value of the zeta function at these points, we extend the divided alternating zeta function by continuity. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-zeta(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(czeta, crio(s0, co(cdif(cc, csn(nat1)), ccncf, cc), wral(s1, cdif(cc, csn(nat1)), wceq(co(co(nat1, cmin, co(nat2, ccxp, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1)))), cmul, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))), csu(s2, cn0, co(csu(s3, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s2)), co(co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cv(s3)), cmul, co(cv(s2), cbc, cv(s3))), cmul, co(co(cv(s3), caddc, nat1), ccxp, cv(s1)))), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: zetacvg
blocks.content: The zeta series is convergent. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm zetacvg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cseq(nat1, caddc, c0), cdm(cli)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(nat1, clt, cfv(cre, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), ccxp, cneg(c1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  abscvgcvg(s0, nat1, c0, cn, cmpt(hs0, cn, co(cv(hs0), ccxp, cneg(cfv(cre, c1)))), w0)
  nnuz()
  1zzd(w0)
  eqtr4d(cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(cv(hs0), ccxp, cneg(cfv(cre, c1)))), cv(s0)), cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), ccxp, cneg(cfv(cre, c1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  3eqtrd(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), ccxp, cneg(cfv(cre, c1))), cfv(cabs, cfv(ce, co(cneg(c1), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0))))), cfv(ce, cfv(cre, co(cneg(c1), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0))))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  fveq2d(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(ce, co(cneg(c1), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(ce, co(cneg(c1), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0)))), co(cv(s0), ccxp, cneg(c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  cxpefd(cv(s0), cneg(c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wceq(cfv(cabs, cfv(ce, co(cneg(c1), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0))))), cfv(ce, cfv(cre, co(cneg(c1), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0)))))), wcel(co(cneg(c1), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0))), cc))
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(co(cneg(c1), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0))), cc), wcel(cneg(c1), cc), wcel(cfv(clog, cv(s0)), cc))
  mulcl(cneg(c1), cfv(clog, cv(s0)))
  absef(co(cneg(c1), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0))))
  eqtr4d(cfv(ce, cfv(cre, co(cneg(c1), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0))))), co(cv(s0), ccxp, cneg(cfv(cre, c1))), cfv(ce, co(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  fveq2d(ce, cfv(cre, co(cneg(c1), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0)))), co(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  3eqtrd(cfv(cre, co(cneg(c1), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0)))), co(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0))), co(co(cfv(cre, cneg(c1)), cmul, cfv(cre, cfv(clog, cv(s0)))), cmin, co(cfv(cim, cneg(c1)), cmul, cfv(cim, cfv(clog, cv(s0))))), co(co(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0))), cmin, nat0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wceq(cfv(cre, co(cneg(c1), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0)))), co(co(cfv(cre, cneg(c1)), cmul, cfv(cre, cfv(clog, cv(s0)))), cmin, co(cfv(cim, cneg(c1)), cmul, cfv(cim, cfv(clog, cv(s0)))))), wcel(cneg(c1), cc), wcel(cfv(clog, cv(s0)), cc))
  remul(cneg(c1), cfv(clog, cv(s0)))
  oveq12d(co(cfv(cre, cneg(c1)), cmul, cfv(cre, cfv(clog, cv(s0)))), cmin, co(cfv(cim, cneg(c1)), cmul, cfv(cim, cfv(clog, cv(s0)))), co(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0))), nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  oveqan12d(cfv(cre, cneg(c1)), cmul, cfv(cre, cfv(clog, cv(s0))), cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), cfv(clog, cv(s0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  renegd(c1, w0)
  rered(cfv(clog, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  sylan9eqr(co(cfv(cim, cneg(c1)), cmul, cfv(cim, cfv(clog, cv(s0)))), nat0, co(cfv(cim, cneg(c1)), cmul, nat0), w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  oveq2d(cfv(cim, cneg(c1)), cmul, cfv(cim, cfv(clog, cv(s0))), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  reim0d(cfv(clog, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  mul01d(cfv(cim, cneg(c1)), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(cim, cneg(c1)), cc), wcel(cneg(c1), cc))
  recnd(cfv(cim, cneg(c1)), wcel(cneg(c1), cc))
  imcl(cneg(c1))

  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(co(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0))), cc), wcel(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), cc), wcel(cfv(clog, cv(s0)), cc))
  mulcl(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), cfv(clog, cv(s0)))
  eqeltrd(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cc, co(cv(s0), ccxp, cneg(c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  cxpcld(cv(s0), cneg(c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cneg(c1), cc))
  negcld(c1, w0)
  mpbird(w0, wcel(cseq(nat1, caddc, cmpt(hs0, cn, co(cv(hs0), ccxp, cneg(cfv(cre, c1))))), cdm(cli)), wcel(cseq(nat0, caddc, cmpt(hs0, cn0, co(co(nat2, ccxp, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1))), cexp, cv(hs0)))), cdm(cli)))
  syl(w0, wcel(cseq(nat0, caddc, cmpt(hs0, cn0, co(co(nat2, ccxp, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1))), cexp, cv(hs0)))), cdm(cli)), wbr(cseq(nat0, caddc, cmpt(hs0, cn0, co(co(nat2, ccxp, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1))), cexp, cv(hs0)))), cli, co(nat1, cdiv, co(nat1, cmin, co(nat2, ccxp, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1)))))))
  geolim(hs1, cmpt(hs0, cn0, co(co(nat2, ccxp, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1))), cexp, cv(hs0))), co(nat2, ccxp, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1))), w0)
  3brtr4d(cfv(cabs, co(nat2, ccxp, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1)))), clt, nat1, co(nat2, ccxp, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1))), co(nat2, ccxp, nat0), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wbr(co(nat2, ccxp, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1))), clt, co(nat2, ccxp, nat0)), wbr(co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1)), clt, nat0))
  mpbird(w0, wbr(co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1)), clt, nat0), wbr(nat1, clt, co(nat0, caddc, cfv(cre, c1))))
  breqtrrd(nat1, clt, co(nat0, caddc, cfv(cre, c1)), cfv(cre, c1), w0)
  addid2d(cfv(cre, c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wb(wbr(co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1)), clt, nat0), wbr(nat1, clt, co(nat0, caddc, cfv(cre, c1)))), wcel(cfv(cre, c1), cr))
  mp3an13(wcel(cfv(cre, c1), cr), wb(wbr(co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1)), clt, nat0), wbr(nat1, clt, co(nat0, caddc, cfv(cre, c1)))), wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(nat0, cr))
  ltsubadd(nat1, cfv(cre, c1), nat0)
  sylancl(w0, wb(wbr(co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1)), clt, nat0), wbr(co(nat2, ccxp, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1))), clt, co(nat2, ccxp, nat0))), wcel(co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1)), cr), wcel(nat0, cr))
  mpanl12(wa(wcel(co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1)), cr), wcel(nat0, cr)), wb(wbr(co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1)), clt, nat0), wbr(co(nat2, ccxp, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1))), clt, co(nat2, ccxp, nat0))), wcel(nat2, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, nat2))
  2re()
  1lt2()
  cxplt(nat2, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1)), nat0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cabs, co(nat2, ccxp, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1)))), co(nat2, ccxp, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1)))), wa(wcel(co(nat2, ccxp, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1))), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat2, ccxp, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1))))))

  a1i(w0, wceq(nat1, co(nat2, ccxp, nat0)))
  eqcomi(nat1, co(nat2, ccxp, nat0))
  ax-mp(wceq(co(nat2, ccxp, nat0), nat1), wcel(nat2, cc))
  cxp0(nat2)

  seqex(nat0, caddc, cmpt(hs0, cn0, co(co(nat2, ccxp, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1))), cexp, cv(hs0))))
  ovex(nat1, cdiv, co(nat1, cmin, co(nat2, ccxp, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1)))))
  climcnds(s0, hs1, cmpt(hs0, cn, co(cv(hs0), ccxp, cneg(cfv(cre, c1)))), cmpt(hs0, cn0, co(co(nat2, ccxp, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cre, c1))), cexp, cv(hs0))), w0)
  eqeltrd(cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(cv(hs0), ccxp, cneg(cfv(cre, c1)))), cv(s0)), cr, co(cv(s0), ccxp, cneg(cfv(cre, c1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  rpred(co(cv(s0), ccxp, cneg(cfv(cre, c1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  breqtrrd(nat0, cle, cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(cv(hs0), ccxp, cneg(cfv(cre, c1)))), cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), ccxp, cneg(cfv(cre, c1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  rpge0d(co(cv(s0), ccxp, cneg(cfv(cre, c1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  syl2anr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(co(cv(s0), ccxp, cneg(cfv(cre, c1))), crp), wcel(cv(s0), crp), wcel(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), cr))
  rpcxpcl(cv(s0), cneg(cfv(cre, c1)))
  3brtr4d(cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(cv(hs0), ccxp, cneg(cfv(cre, c1)))), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(cv(hs0), ccxp, cneg(cfv(cre, c1)))), cv(s0)), cfv(ce, co(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), cmul, cfv(clog, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))), cfv(ce, co(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wbr(cfv(ce, co(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), cmul, cfv(clog, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))), cle, cfv(ce, co(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0))))), wbr(co(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), cmul, cfv(clog, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), cle, co(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0)))))
  3brtr4d(co(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), cmul, cfv(clog, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), cle, co(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0))), cneg(co(cfv(cre, c1), cmul, cfv(clog, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))), cneg(co(cfv(cre, c1), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wbr(cneg(co(cfv(cre, c1), cmul, cfv(clog, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))), cle, cneg(co(cfv(cre, c1), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0))))), wbr(co(cfv(cre, c1), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0))), cle, co(cfv(cre, c1), cmul, cfv(clog, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))))

  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cfv(cre, c1), cr))

  lttrd(nat0, cfv(cre, c1), nat1, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat0, cr))
  0re()
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat1, cr))
  a1i(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, nat1))
  0lt1()
  lemul2(cfv(clog, cv(s0)), cfv(clog, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(cre, c1))
  lenegd(co(cfv(cre, c1), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0))), co(cfv(cre, c1), cmul, cfv(clog, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(co(cfv(cre, c1), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0))), cr), wcel(cfv(cre, c1), cr), wcel(cfv(clog, cv(s0)), cr))
  remulcl(cfv(cre, c1), cfv(clog, cv(s0)))
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(co(cfv(cre, c1), cmul, cfv(clog, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), cr), wcel(cfv(cre, c1), cr), wcel(cfv(clog, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cr))

  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(co(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), cmul, cfv(clog, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), cr), wcel(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), cr), wcel(cfv(clog, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cr))

  relogcld(cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
